nodes.text: This unidentified courier worked for the Rebel Alliance. While on an important mission with his close friend Mari, he was gunned down in a cantina by Boba Fett, who was out to collect a bounty that the Imperial Security Bureau had issued on the two couriers. Eventually, Mari completed their mission with the help of a motley group of spacers.
Although as of yet unnamed, this character is a significant plot device in the role playing game scenario in which he appears, as it is his killing that initiates the entire scenario.
